docs.lead_paragraph: A small Massachusetts town is grieving after a woman and her four children were killed in a house fire.

headline.print_headline: Town Grieving After Mother, 4 Children Die in House Fire
headline.main: Town Grieving After Mother, 4 Children Die in House Fire

docs.snippet: A small Massachusetts town is grieving after a woman and her four children were killed in a house fire....

docs.lead_paragraph: Armed with a hefty dividend, Xerox Corp shares look cheap even as they have shot up this year following the company's spin-off of its business processing business, according to an article in Barron's.

headline.print_headline: Xerox Shares Look Cheap Even With Stock's 2017 Jump: Barron's
headline.main: Xerox Shares Look Cheap Even With Stock's 2017 Jump: Barron's

docs.snippet: Armed with a hefty dividend, Xerox Corp shares look cheap even as they have shot up this year following the company's spin-off of its business processing business, according to an article in Barron's....

docs.lead_paragraph: Lindsay Allen and her Notre Dame teammates held up four fingers as the balloons and confetti fell around them. They had a lot to celebrate after winning a fourth consecutive ACC Tournament title.

headline.print_headline: No. 3 Notre Dame Wins ACC Title, Beats No. 13 Duke 84-61
headline.main: No. 3 Notre Dame Wins ACC Title, Beats No. 13 Duke 84-61

docs.snippet: Lindsay Allen and her Notre Dame teammates held up four fingers as the balloons and confetti fell around them. They had a lot to celebrate after winning a fourth consecutive ACC Tournament title....

docs.lead_paragraph: An Afghan family of five who obtained special visas to relocate to the U.S. were detained by immigration officials when they arrived at Los Angeles International Airport on Thursday and have been in custody ever since, according to their attorneys.

headline.print_headline: Afghan Family Detained in Los Angeles Are Asking for Release
headline.main: Afghan Family Detained in Los Angeles Are Asking for Release

docs.snippet: An Afghan family of five who obtained special visas to relocate to the U.S. were detained by immigration officials when they arrived at Los Angeles International Airport on Thursday and have been in custody ever since, according to their attorneys...

docs.lead_paragraph: Laura Muir led an impressive final day for Britain at the European indoor athletics championships with her second gold medal of the three-day event after winning the 3,000-meter race on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Muir Leads British Medal Harvest as Spanovic Shines
headline.main: Muir Leads British Medal Harvest as Spanovic Shines

docs.snippet: Laura Muir led an impressive final day for Britain at the European indoor athletics championships with her second gold medal of the three-day event after winning the 3,000-meter race on Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Muslim students visiting an Oklahoma lawmaker's office in the state capitol were required to fill out a form that asked if they beat their wives and other questions that offended them, an Islamic advocacy group said.

headline.print_headline: Muslim Students Asked 'Do You Beat Your Wife?' by Oklahoma Lawmaker
headline.main: Muslim Students Asked 'Do You Beat Your Wife?' by Oklahoma Lawmaker

docs.snippet: Muslim students visiting an Oklahoma lawmaker's office in the state capitol were required to fill out a form that asked if they beat their wives and other questions that offended them, an Islamic advocacy group said....

docs.lead_paragraph: Burkina Faso film director Apolline Woye Traore, who won three prizes at the country's prestigious Fespaco festival on Saturday, knows a thing or two about challenges.

headline.print_headline: Burkina Faso Director Gives African Women Authentic Voice
headline.main: Burkina Faso Director Gives African Women Authentic Voice

docs.snippet: Burkina Faso film director Apolline Woye Traore, who won three prizes at the country's prestigious Fespaco festival on Saturday, knows a thing or two about challenges....

docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of protesters have marched through the Romanian capital of Bucharest to support the country's anti-corruption authority and demand that state institutions be free of political interference.

headline.print_headline: Romanians March to Protest Persistent Govt Corruption
headline.main: Romanians March to Protest Persistent Govt Corruption

docs.snippet: Thousands of protesters have marched through the Romanian capital of Bucharest to support the country's anti-corruption authority and demand that state institutions be free of political interference....

docs.lead_paragraph: The race for the major player of the year awards in college basketball was a split decision in 2016. Oklahoma's Buddy Hield won the Naismith and Wooden awards, while Michigan State's Denzel Valentine was The Associated Press player of the year.

headline.print_headline: Kansas' Mason, Nova's Hart Leading Player of the Year Races
headline.main: Kansas' Mason, Nova's Hart Leading Player of the Year Races

docs.snippet: The race for the major player of the year awards in college basketball was a split decision in 2016. Oklahoma's Buddy Hield won the Naismith and Wooden awards, while Michigan State's Denzel Valentine was The Associated Press player of the year....

docs.lead_paragraph: A Kenyan police official says a British rancher has been shot and killed by pastoral herders in central Kenya who have been invading large farms, some of which double as wildlife conservation areas.

headline.print_headline: British Rancher Shot, Killed in Kenya in a Farm Invasion
headline.main: British Rancher Shot, Killed in Kenya in a Farm Invasion

docs.snippet: A Kenyan police official says a British rancher has been shot and killed by pastoral herders in central Kenya who have been invading large farms, some of which double as wildlife conservation areas....
